creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: pair of earrings, each ear piece is a circle with curlicues on both ends; decorative piece dangles from ear piece; decorative piece has two circular flat pieces sitting on top of a small filigree sphere; this sphere has four flowers on it; the small sphere rests on top of a larger filigree sphere; this sphere has two solid spheres and two flat circles attached to its sides
title: Pair of Earrings
